svg.text: A literary work in verse form
A grouped set of lines in a poem
A central topic or idea explored in the poem
A figure of speech comparing two unlike things
The voice or persona speaking in the poem
A single line of verse in a poem
A stanza contained in the poem
A theme explored in the poem
A metaphor employed in the poem
The speaker or voice of the poem
The poet who wrote the poem
A line contained in the stanza
The subject matter of the theme
The addressee of the speaker's words

g.text: Classes: 6 (Poem, Stanza, Line, Theme, Metaphor, Speaker)
